data.title: Paul Melvin on LinkedIn: Engineering alumnus Aaron LaBerge creates magic, connection at Disney
data.meta_description: “One of the keys to success is continually learning and staying curious about what’s new. It’s part of why I wanted to be an engineer. When you get to apply…
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

“One of the keys to success is continually learning and staying curious about what’s new. It’s part of why I wanted to be an engineer. When you get to apply that, and millions of people benefit from what you build, it pushes you to stay out front and continue to build products people love." Having worked with Aaron LaBerge for many years, that curiosity -- along with deep technical knowledge -- are hallmarks of he and the super-talented teams he leads. Nice spotlight from his alma mater, just as the Gamecocks look to a Women's Basketball Sweet 16 -- and a potential perfect season. https://lnkd.in/gkv-tZ9J
